newsitem.title: UK: TABLE-Meyer Intl yr profit beats forecasts.
newsitem.headline: TABLE-Meyer Intl yr profit beats forecasts.

text.p: NOTE - Analysts had forecast pre-tax profits in a range between 42.0 and 43.9 million stg.
Year-ago results exclude exceptional charges of 21.1 million stg and 15.4 million stg.
Full company name - Meyer International Plc. -- London Newsroom +44 171 542 7717
